description:
Ton and Shinyao are reunited. They attempt to return to the cafe, but instead are confined within the room.
They`re able to escape with Wayne`s help, but he becomes trapped inside a computer by the developer of the Magic Mirror app.
While Vlad and Helsing are fighting, Haysin appears before Ton and Shinyao. Haysin claims to be the mastermind behind the series of events and commands an Umbra to attack her. When Ton sees Shinyao fall from the building, the shock causes her to lose control over the power in her ring.
Source: crunchyroll
